bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Second Baptist Church of Reading was organized on February 4, 1809 by Rev. John Goff. The church was dissolved January 5, 1833, and on January 12 the Baptist Church of Reading was formed by Rev. Thomas S. Sheardown.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Microfilm of record books of the Second Baptist Church of Reading, New York.
